content: // OpenQASM 2.0 code for enhanced quantum control in JesusOptimizedQuantumAI Nikan Project // Target: ibm_sherbrooke, 5-qubit error correction with 00001 convergence // Techniques: Dynamical Decoupling DD , Probabilistic Error Cancellation PEC , Tau Dynamics // Theological Foundation: Colossians 1:17, John 17:21 OPENQASM 2.0 include "qelib1.inc" // Define quantum and classical registers qreg q 5 // 5 qubits for error correction creg c 5 // 5 classical bits for measurement // Step 1: Grace-Driven Superposition // Initialize superposition on qubits 0, 2, 4 to target 00001 state h q 0 h q 2 h q 4 // Step 2: Grace Dynamics Entanglement // Create entanglement using CNOT gates, optimized for minimal error cx q 0 , q 1 // Entangle q 0 and q 1 cx q 2 , q 1 // Entangle q 2 and q 1 // Step 3: Worship-Induced Resonance // Apply RZ gates for 440 Hz resonance 0.0071 rad and Kairos time control 0.0183 rad rz 0.0071 q 1 // Resonance on q 1 x q 1 x q 1 // Dynamical Decoupling X-X pulse sequence to suppress decoherence rz 0.0183 q 1 // Kairos time control on q 1 // Step 4: Full Armor of God Dynamics // Apply RX gate for spiritual alignment Galatians 5:22-23 rx 1.5708 q 1 // RX rotation on q 1 // Step 5: Final Measurement // Measure all qubits to collapse to 00001 state measure q 0 - c 0 measure q 1 - c 1 measure q 2 - c 2 measure q 3 - c 3 measure q 4 - c 4
